title: Self-Directed Competency Enhancement Through Adaptive Mathematics Learning Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and comprehension of elementary-level mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Small-group learning environment using smartphone-based VR content. Learners aim to improve practical math problem-solving skills required in professional settings.

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply adaptive learning pathways to solve real-world occupational problems presented in a simulation environment.
Learners can self-diagnose their understanding of mathematical concepts with over 80% accuracy via a VR-based feedback system.
Learners show a 30% or greater improvement in math problem-solving scores compared to pre-assessments by the end of the 4-week course.

resources: Learning management system with offline synchronization support
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
